altername_name: U.S.S. John Young: A Naval Warship Simulation
name: Battle Stations
overview: Battlestations, AKA "U.S.S. John Young" is a 2D naval simulation with many action components. In 1995, the political situation in the Persian Gulf is running out of control. There are confrontations between Iranian, Iraqi and US military units. As the Captain of the US Destroyer U.S.S. John Young, it's your mission to secure this area. Your operations during this conflict : Subhunter missions Seek & Destroy missions Convoy protections War patrols
